property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have a RexStars, this creature gets "shield trigger" in your shield zone. {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Fire creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature or it attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battles. ■ During the turn you put this creature, this creature gets +1000000 power while battling.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-BD3 Dream Saga Deck: Book of Momoking

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Fire creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {POWERED BREAKER} (This creature breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.)} ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a RexStars or fire creature, put that creature. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard. ■ While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power for each fire card in your graveyard.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-BD3 Dream Saga Deck: Book of Momoking

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MULTI STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Light or Fire creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Each of your other RexStars gets +2000 power. ■ Your opponent can't cast non-Light spells. ■ Your opponent's first creature each turn is put tapped.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-BD3 Dream Saga Deck: Book of Momoking

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put an evolution creature that has "Momoking" in its name from your hand that can evolve from this creature. ■ 'Shinkapower': When this creature evolves, you may put the top card of this creature into your graveyard after this creature attacks. If you do, untap this creature and draw a card.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-BD3 Dream Saga Deck: Book of Momoking

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, discard a card from your hand and draw 2 cards. Then you may put a creature from your hand that costs 7 or less that can evolve from this creature on top of this creature. ■ 'Shinkapower': When this creature evolves, untap each time it wins a battle this turn.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-BD3 Dream Saga Deck: Book of Momoking

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Fire creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, choose one of the following: ► Destroy all your opponent's creatures that have power 3000 or less: ► Choose one of your opponent's shields and put it into their graveyard.

property.name: Set

property.name: Rules
property.value: {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Fire creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, destroy all your opponent's creatures that cost 4 or less. ■ While this creature is attacking, your opponent can't choose this creature with spells that cost 4 or less.

property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Fire creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {INVASION}-Fire|rex4 (When one of your Fire|rex4 attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, destroy all your opponent's elements that cost 2 or less.

property.name: Set

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Nature creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {INVASION}-Nature|rex4 (When one of your Nature|rex4 attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then you may return a card from your mana zone into your hand.

property.value: ■ Reveal the top 2 cards of your deck. Put all Dragons revealed this way into your mana zone tapped and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Memento Guardian Shrine, Prison Court of D

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this D2 Field is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Each of your creatures gets "blocker". (Whenever another D2 Field is put, destroy this D2 Field.) D2 WRAP Denjara Switch: Whenever a player draws the first card on their turn, you may turn this D2 Field upside down for the rest of the game. If you do, tap all your opponent's creatures.}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This turn, the next creature you summon costs 3 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-BD3 Dream Saga Deck: Book of Momoking

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Draw a card. Then you may put a creature that has "Momoking" in its name from your hand that costs 8 or less. If you do, you may tap it. ■ Until the start of your next turn, whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks, that creature attacks one of your creatures that has "Momoking" in its name if able.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-BD3 Dream Saga Deck: Book of Momoking

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHINKARISE}: You may put evolution creatures on this tamaseed as if it were a creature. ■ When you put this tamaseed, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Reveal a Jokers or RexStars from among them and put it into your hand or mana zone. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
